author: Fiach Kelly, Jack Power
title: Harris challenges HSE to speed up turnaround time for Covid-19 test results
description: Some restrictions may be eased on May 5th but social distancing to remain until vaccine found, says Minister
content:
The health service faces a key challenge to speed up the turnaround time for coronavirus test results once it clears a backlog later this week, Minister for Health Simon Harris has said.
Mr Harris said the Health Service Executive still has work to do to inc… [+4728 chars]
